item.title: Hollywood Flashback: Kristen Bell Sleuthed Out Success With ‘Veronica Mars’
item.description: Before receiving Emmy nominations for ‘Nobody Wants This,’ the actress received acclaim for her performance in ‘Veronica Mars.’
